alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 02 at 12:09PM EST until January 02 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Around one half to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Barnegat Bay and the tidal waterways that flow into it. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor roadway flooding is possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Barnegat Bay at Barnegat Light MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.0 ft, Moderate 2.0 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 02/07 AM 4.3 1.8 1.4 Minor 02/07 PM 3.1 0.6 1.1 None 03/08 AM 4.4 1.9 1.5 Minor 03/08 PM 3.8 1.3 1.8 Minor 04/09 AM 4.4 1.9 1.6 Minor 04/09 PM 3.1 0.6 1.1 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
